itemDisplayName: SQL Server 2016 AlwaysOn with Managed Disks in Availability Zones
description: This template creates Azure VMs on an existing VNET, and provisions a SQL Server 2016 AlwaysOn Availability Group cluster across Availability Zones
summary: This template creates Azure VMs for a SQL Server 2016 AlwaysOn Availability Group cluster on an existing Azure VNET and Active Directory domain.
